name: k6-load-test
description: Run a test script using k6, either locally or in the cloud.
author: Load Impact / k6

inputs.name: cloud
inputs.label: Run in k6 Cloud
inputs.helpMarkDown:
To run in the k6 cloud, you'll have to provide your k6 cloud token as a secret variable with the name `K6_CLOUD_TOKEN`.

Dont have a k6 account yet? Go to https://k6.io/cloud and activate your free trial.

inputs.name: filename
inputs.label: Test script filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the test script to execute, relative to the workspace.

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Additional arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to provide to the k6 CLI. See https://k6.io/docs/using-k6/options for details.
